location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Shariarjee Rustomjee, Bombay, to Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, Shariarjee Rustomjee, Bombay, writes to Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, on the subject of his planned purchase of goods for sale at Bushire or some other market in Persia. He writes that he has appointed as his agent a national of Yezed and is apprehensive that this circumstance might tempt the authorities of Bushire to levy exorbitant impositions. Rustomjee presents the case that, as a British subject, his goods should be taxed as British property and secured from unlawful encroachment.
